refined wheat flour.reason: Low in fiber and nutrients; spikes blood sugar.
refined wheat flour.after_effects: May contribute to weight gain, blood sugar issues, digestive problems when overconsumed.

refined palm oil.reason: High in saturated fats which may raise cholesterol.
refined palm oil.after_effects: Excessive intake may increase risk of heart disease.

sugar.reason: Increases risk of obesity, diabetes, and cavities.
sugar.after_effects: Energy spikes then crashes; weight gain if overconsumed.

invert sugar syrup.reason: Fast-absorbing sugar form; increases blood sugar quickly.
invert sugar syrup.after_effects: May contribute to weight gain and energy crashes.

cashew nuts.reason: Good source of healthy fats, protein, vitamins and minerals.
cashew nuts.after_effects: Supports energy, heart and brain health when eaten in moderation.

milk solids.reason: Source of protein and calcium; may be difficult for lactose-intolerant people.
milk solids.after_effects: Supports bone health; may cause bloating for some.

butter.reason: Contains fat-soluble vitamins but is high in saturated fat.
butter.after_effects: In moderation aids nutrient absorption; excess may raise cholesterol.

raising agents.reason: Used to make baked goods rise; safe in regulated amounts.
raising agents.after_effects: No significant effects at normal use levels.

iodised salt.reason: Provides iodine to support thyroid; excess sodium is harmful.
iodised salt.after_effects: Prevents iodine deficiency; excessive intake may cause hypertension.

emulsifier.reason: Helps oil/water mix; safe in small quantities.
emulsifier.after_effects: Generally safe; some emulsifiers can affect gut microbiome if overconsumed.

flavouring substances.reason: Artificial or nature-identical flavors add taste but no nutrition.
flavouring substances.after_effects: Some people may have sensitivities or allergic responses.

hydrogenated oils.reason: Can contain trans fats which are harmful for heart health.
hydrogenated oils.after_effects: Raise bad cholesterol (LDL), increase heart disease risk.

almonds.reason: Rich in vitamin E, magnesium and healthy fats.
almonds.after_effects: Supports heart and brain health; satiating.

honey.reason: Natural sweetener with antioxidants but still sugar.
honey.after_effects: Can spike blood sugar if overused.

artificial colors.reason: Some synthetic dyes linked to sensitivity/hyperactivity in children.
artificial colors.after_effects: May cause allergic reactions for some people.

malt.reason: Source of carbohydrates, may affect blood sugar if consumed in excess.

barley.reason: Rich in fiber and micronutrients, supports digestion.
barley.after_effects: May cause bloating in large amounts.

wheat flour.reason: Source of energy and some nutrients, but contains gluten which is a common allergen.

millet.reason: Nutritious whole grain, good source of fiber and minerals.

wheat gluten.reason: Protein source, but common allergen for some people.

edible iodized salt.reason: Essential nutrient in small amounts; excessive intake can raise blood pressure.
edible iodized salt.after_effects: Possible high blood pressure with excess consumption.

soy protein isolate.reason: High-protein option, but allergy risk for some.

acidity regulators (INS 501(ii), INS 500.reason: Used to control acidity and pH; generally safe.

vitamins.after_effects: Improves overall health; excess intake may have side effects.

refined wheat flour (maida).reason: Processed grain; low in fiber and nutrients compared to whole grain.

refined palmolein oil.reason: High in saturated fats and may contribute to heart disease.

hydrogenated vegetable oil.reason: Contains trans fats linked to heart disease.

eggs.reason: Good protein source and contains essential nutrients.

emulsifiers (471, 477).reason: Food additives used for texture; generally considered safe.

humectants (422, 420i).reason: Help retain moisture in products; generally safe.

liquid glucose.reason: High glycemic index; spikes blood sugar.
liquid glucose.after_effects: May cause rapid blood sugar increase.

baking powder/raising agents (500ii, 450.reason: Used for leavening; generally safe in small quantities.

cocoa solids (0.2%).reason: Rich in antioxidants and minerals when consumed in moderation.

artificial flavours (vanilla, chocolate).reason: May contain synthetic chemicals, possible sensitivity in some people.

colours (150c, 150d, 102, 122, 132, 133).reason: Some artificial colours are linked to hyperactivity and allergies.

preservatives (200, 282).reason: Preserve shelf life; safe in regulated amounts but can cause sensitivity.

coriander.reason: Aromatics with digestive benefits and low allergy risk.

chilli.reason: Adds heat; may cause digestive irritation or sensitivity.
chilli.after_effects: Possible digestive discomfort and allergic reactions.

cumin.reason: Promotes digestion and has antioxidant properties.

cassia_leaf.reason: Aromatic flavoring with no major side effects in usual culinary amounts.

black_pepper.reason: Pungency and enhances nutrient absorption; possible irritation in high amounts.

cassia_bark.reason: Flavorful but contains coumarin which can be harmful in excess.

clove.reason: Strong flavor; can cause irritation at high doses.

black_cardamom.reason: Adds smoky aroma; safe with minimal side effects.

star_anise.reason: Licorice flavor; safe in culinary doses.

dried_ginger.reason: Widely used for digestive benefits; low risk.

iodized_salt.reason: Enhances flavor; essential mineral but no health benefit in excess.
iodized_salt.after_effects: High intake may raise blood pressure.
